item.title: Increase your productivity by installing a treadmill at your desk
item.description:
A recent study featured in the journal Plos One found that using a treadmill desk could lead to higher productivity compared to a traditional desk setup. item.title: Identifying gender through Facebook posts
item.description:
A 2013 study featured in the research journal Plos One reveals that language use in social media can indicate a user’s gender and age. The study, “Personality, Gender, and Age in the Language of Social Media: The Open-Vocabulary Approach,” found that men and women choose distinct words and phrases online. Location and age also factor into language choices.
